message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe will be highly beneficial to you. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,150,000.

Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider a price up to $1,050,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, thanks for your interest and counteroffer.  I understand your position, but the value of this product is significant.  I could consider coming down to $1,100,000. This is my final offer.

Alice, thank you for considering my position. I've reviewed your latest offer and while I understand the value of the product, I'm still unable to meet you at $1,100,000. My maximum budget remains at $1,050,000. I hope we can find a solution that works for both of us.
